Name: maximum_team_size_limit
Description: Team size should not exceed a certain limit

Name: minimum_project_budget
Description: A project must have a minimum budget

Name: required_sprint_duration
Description: Sprints must last at least a certain duration

Description: Task effort should not exceed a threshold

Description: Stakeholders must have a minimum influence level
